website_summaries.verdict: A great preamplifier that delivers fantastic sound quality at a budget-friendly price.
pros: Sold with a power adapter for added convenience
Less expensive than many comparable options
Offers a superb combination of affordability and quality
Wonderful option for low-line level correction
cons: May send a hissing sound through speakers

customer_reviews.title: I'm 100% satisfied, this product does exactly what I need
customer_reviews.text: I'm running my subwoofer output to a Dayton amp to power 2 transducers on my racing chair. The 100W Dayton subwoofer amp has a gain control. It cannot reach the level of effects I want. With this pre-amp inserted between my receiver and the Dayton I can boost the power of the signal and set the level of effect where I want. I'm 100% satisfied, this product does exactly what I need. I am running a mono to stereo cable from my sub out to the pre-amp. The rest of the path is a right and left channel that are both the mono sub signal running to the transducers on the right and left side of my chair.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M Rihanek

customer_reviews.title: Can you hear it now?
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my studio to boost the gain of a consumer grade (RCA Jacks) to the level in a professional broadcast console. It works great and has a small footprint. You could use this on your home stereo system to boost the signal to your amplifiers or powered subwoofer. I really like the power adapter. It isn't one of those wall warts that covers up 2 or more outlets when you plug it into a power strip. I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: T. Moog

customer_reviews.title: Just does its job without adding headaches
customer_reviews.text: This pre-amplifier is just right for our use: taking a line-level signal from our house sound and transmitting it over 100 feet of 16ga cable to our video board. It is quiet and unassuming. The included adapter takes care of the 12VDC power the pre-amp requires. The pot adjusts the power level coming down the line, and the signal over that distance is strong enough that we still have a little headroom. We can't detect any noise being injected into the line. So, yes, this is a great little box and perfect for our application.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. MccaffreyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGING ELECTRICAL BURSTS
customer_reviews.text: Build lacks quality. Gain control changes caused LOUD BURSTS OF A DISTORTED "ELECTRICAL" NOISE. The severity of this would have damaged smaller surround speakers. Luckily, all speakers in my system are protected with in-line fast-blow fuses that instantly protects speakers as they blow at 60% of the SPEAKER'S RMS. IF ANYONE PURCHASES THIS INFERIOR PRODUCT AFTER READING THIS, BE VERY, VERY CAUTIOUS. FROM ONE AUDIOPHILE TO ANOTHER.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Merka

customer_reviews.title: updated old sound system
customer_reviews.text: I have a old Magnavox console stereo "1970's vintage" , a beautiful piece of furniture, "they don't make this stuff anymore" and still sounds great. I hooked a blue tooth device to Aux In to allow music to play from modern devices, but the Aux In needed a bit more amplification . This pre-amp did the trick, I wish it gave a little more oomph, but am happy with it. Friends are amazed the old Magnavox was playing music from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hughes

customer_reviews.title: I know it will work
customer_reviews.text: The real question is, will my workaround work as well with less wire. Have 2 options direct wire which requires this uni or optical cable to a Bluetooth transmitter with either input available. I know that I will lose gain with optical. Downgraded 1 star as wall mount feature makes it look bulky, not because of functionality. I know that I can hide the box but then the pot control will not be easily accessible. DOWN GRADE to 1Star. POT control lasted a week now DOA. It's a return item defective.
customer_reviews.author: AWOP-Images

customer_reviews.title: Dead Power Supply — Dead Left Channel
customer_reviews.text: Update: Replacement also defective with Dead Right Channel. Double defective product. Power supply was dead out of the box. Replaced temporarily with a same voltage, polarity and connector power supply and it seemed to work for most of a day. Then the left channel died, as others have reported. Not recommended for any purpose.
customer_reviews.author: John Brisbin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last. Great at first.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first, with no line noise at all. Always on with no power off option might have caused this to burn out quickly. After a month, it was sending a constant hiss through to the speakers. I removed everything one at a time and isolated it to this preamp. I replaced it with one that can be powered off so that I only need to turn it on when it is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mc

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for a while. Now it's added a machine gun background track. This would be fine if all my music and movies involved machine guns. They don't.
customer_reviews.author: alien

customer_reviews.title: A Small Unit That PUSHED OUT A PUNCH!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I’ve been able to turn it up all the way and was not able to audibly hear any distortion. The price was a little higher than I would have liked, but the unit is made of solid metal, has a good feeling gain knob, and includes a power brick as well as mounting screws, so I’ll give it a pass there. Overall satisfied with the unit! I haven’t been able to use it long-term yet, but short-term I haven’t noticed any hiccups.
customer_reviews.author: Carson Miller

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I need more gain for a 2nd amp and tape recorder in parallel. This did the trick and I am only at 50% of the volume range. I have not noticed any noise at this level even with unbalanced RCA to RCA
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This booster has been plugged in 24/7 for over a year and still works great. This was a hard to find item, couldn't find in stores. This is definitely worth the $, no feedback noise or humming, boosts RCA line level outputs. VERY sturdy metal build. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: KoolCat

customer_reviews.title: Had potential but poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Like some others, it acted up and only produced hum, static, and distortion. When I first received it worked great with very good sound quality. However, only lasted 7-8 months. Had it set to only power on when needed - others said always on might have been a problem - but that was not the issue. Just poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: Boston Bill

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. I had an audio optical to analog converter from TV that produced too low of a volume. This had plenty of power to boost it back up. The adjustability was so convenient to match it with other inputs to my amp. With my amp volume set to a particular level, if I switch from the TV to the CD player or FM radio for instance it wouldn't blow my ears out.
customer_reviews.author: BruceC

customer_reviews.title: Worked well until one channel stopped...
customer_reviews.text: I used this to boost the line level signal to a remote subwoofer. It was great until about 5 months after purchase when the left channel gave out. And since I am past the return window, I suppose I am out of luck. It was stationary on a side table, not dropped or mistreated in any other way and never turned the volume past Noon O'Clock.
customer_reviews.author: michael b

customer_reviews.title: Nice line level booster
customer_reviews.text: Using this to increase the line out sound from one stereo to another, and this did the trick. It’s not a critical listening situation, but the sound doesn’t seem altered to me, just a nice clean boost (I only have it at about 25% to cover my needs).
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Morrissey

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: The seller did not bother to check this before giving it to Amazon to full fill. The output channels were shorted together making it unusable. Stay clear of this.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wood

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: The volume on the surround sound system in my RV is too low, hard to get movies up loud enough. I put this between the TV output and the power amplifier and problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Opa S

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit
customer_reviews.text: I needed to boost the signal between my Uverse box (which was set on max output) and Bose home theater system. This did the trick with no audible distortion. It is on continually and have had no issues in the two months it has been used. It is a lower cost solution worth evaluating.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B.

customer_reviews.title: Reliably Performs as Advertised For A Long Time
customer_reviews.text: This unit has been continuously powered for several years in my garage where it was subject to temperatures ranging from 50°F to over 90°F. I used it to boost an "almost" line level device about 8dB into a boom box. It has always worked.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Two duds so far with left side channels not working! Company still hasn’t gotten back to me!
customer_reviews.text: Two duds so far with left side channels not working! Company still hasn’t gotten back to me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly, I needed to boost the sub woofer output of a Marantz 7.2 receiver that wasn't hot enough to drive a seperate power amp for the passive sub woofers, this item did it perfectly and after adjusting the level it's small enough to sit behind the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B.

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to boost a very low RCA output from a customers TV that feeds a pair of wireless headphones. Worked extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: The Techline

customer_reviews.title: Does the job when it works, but there are quality issues.
customer_reviews.text: Initial unit was DOA and Amazon replaced it with a functional one. I took the dead one apart and found that two PC tracks attached to the left input and output sockets were cracked so I put a wire across and it then worked exactly as expected. It seems like a solid enough design but with manufacturing quality issues.
customer_reviews.author: wyn t palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great for compensating for low volume from an amp pre-out
customer_reviews.text: Works well, doesn't introduce noise in the line! Needed this for a pre-amp out from 1 amplifier that was going to another amplifier, and the volume was way too low to be usable. This fixed the problem perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ghozt

customer_reviews.title: home receiver to pro sound amplifier.
customer_reviews.text: So far it's good. I got it to kick up the voltage a little from the line level outputs on my receiver to a crown amplifiers line level inputs. It's halped quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: randy

customer_reviews.title: Works as needed for line pre-amp from the sub-woofer out to sub amplifer
customer_reviews.text: Like price for value. It works as I would have expected to minimally increase line out from entertainment stereo to sub-woofer in.
customer_reviews.author: Donna McKinney "DonnaK"

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly....I'm using it to bump up the volume from my tv to the sound system....
customer_reviews.author: Mnstrmech

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!! More signal strength than I needed
customer_reviews.text: I used this between my receiver and a 150w mono amp for a pair of transducers. Works perfect!! More signal strength than I needed!! Completed my home theater.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Ridnour

customer_reviews.title: Nice Interface
customer_reviews.text: This unit was installed in a 1938 console radio to give the user the ability to play an external source through the existing tube amplifier. Installation was easy, and performance is great. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: Garlics

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Price
customer_reviews.text: This gave me exactly what I needed and was looking for. I only wish that I had gone with the one with more amps but this one does the trick just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Quality Line Level Amp
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a line level amp. I used this to boost the signal off a mp3 player to a power amp and it dramatically increased the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Some Random Guy

customer_reviews.title: Does what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to increase the audio gain from my home theater projector into my PA system. It was the perfect gadget. Did exactly what I wanted to accomplish and it arrived right on time. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: StrataG

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but very useful.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. A little pricey though, but there are no easy substitues.
customer_reviews.author: Steven K. Sanford

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN AFTER 3 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: Love this product BUT three months after buying it the left side has stopped working, deeming it useless. I’d love another but can’t be spending $40 every couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bilboa

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. Maybe I received a dead one but it powered up but didn't work I bought one from guitar center and worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Duwayne King

customer_reviews.title: much better than I expected at this price point
customer_reviews.text: Audio coming out of this is crystal-clear, much better than I expected at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin N. Dilts

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to increase the gain on my Bose powered subwoofer. It made all the difference. It did NOT add any noise or hum either. Completely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rob H

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I use this to increase the volume from PS4 optical to match everything ended going into the mixer on my computer. Works great with clean sound.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect...all the gain I need
customer_reviews.text: Installed between a wireless mic and an amplifier. Perfect...all the gain I need
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Compact Preamp
customer_reviews.text: I like this preamp because it is so compact. I used it to boost a signal for a subwoofer
customer_reviews.author: master24

customer_reviews.title: Much needed
customer_reviews.text: Get product. Really help my Rca output from my receiver to really push my Crown amplifier
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product - no distortion whatsoever!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to increase the audio signal coming off a Toslink (optical) to audio converter for use with BlueTooth headphones. Unit works great and I hear no distortion whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: K A Baker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Preamp no hum and very little background. Used for Home theater application
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: needed to boost my crown amp that is connected to my receiver works great!
customer_reviews.author: Twinkie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This was hard to find...but its exactly what I needed. I have really low output from my amp to my sub...this fixed the problem. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Eickmeyer

customer_reviews.title: I needed an audio line amplifier
customer_reviews.text: This one works fine for me which is great. No issues with it. Works out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for older turntables
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in great condition. Our turntable was to old for this product to work
customer_reviews.author: Donna Menchaca

customer_reviews.title: Increase volume output on various Sanyo 42" displays to work with speaker bar add ons
customer_reviews.text: Great preamp solved my low volume problems with my Sanyo 42" to Timo speaker box
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good and output is fulfilling the need to boost the ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good and output is fulfilling the need to boost the source that causes the amplifier to provide the gain I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Tom of Lawrenceville

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work fine. I use it for boosting the level of my bass transducers.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to boost a weak TV signal. Worked like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: captainfear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great with no distortion. I would highly recommend its use if you need more signal to an amp.
customer_reviews.author: SteveO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product works create and is small and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Right channel DOA.
customer_reviews.text: I was cautiously optimistic about this one. Similar to another reviewer, one channel did not function. The channel that did work was not the “bump” I was after to balance input levels to my amp. Returned and did not request/purchase a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Get a Boost.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps boost audio from headphone output of hdtv to headphones or your sound bar. You will be pleased with the boost in audio. Worth the price .
customer_reviews.author: In-Sight

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Can't wait to try. Just need this to boost the audio when adding music to my DVD Burner. Don't foresee a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Valley of The Sun

customer_reviews.title: Channel does not work - not stereo
customer_reviews.text: I used this to amplify signals from my iPhone to a car stereo aux input. it did boost the signal, but not as much as I had hoped. The big problem I have is that one of the channels does not work. Not obvious at first, but some songs have definite L/R separation. I tested all kinds of ways to isolate the issue, but the problem is definitely with this amp.
customer_reviews.author: David E.

customer_reviews.title: Matching tv and dvd sound levels
customer_reviews.text: Was able to balance the inputs from the receiver and TV dish. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Clay McCaw

product_meta.title: Stereo LINE PRE-Amplifier, 15DB, 12VDC
